subject: p19028690
Findings: There are low lung volumes without focal consolidation, effusion, or pneumothorax. The cardiac silhouette is moderately enlarged, there is stable widening of the mediastinum. Pulmonary vasculature appears normal.
Impression: Low lung volumes, without pneumonia or CHF. Moderate cardiac enlargement is stable in appearance.
